This is a fine solution for a stand-alone spinner. But it doesn't really make use of Rich. There's no way to use Rich's [console markup](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/markup.html) for example.

I think it should be implemented as part of the Progress class, which gives you the automatic update, and a captures stdout so it won't break the visuals.

From a rough review, I don't think this implementation is thread-safe. People may want multiple spinners to run together, like `Progress`. Refreshing the output with `RECALL` will likely mess up the console output.

After all, I am glad to see this will be landed in `rich`.
